post.author: pbmax
post.body:
i have never seen this guy before, but he lets carmack do a judo choke hold on him and he gets a sneak peek at Doom4

funny stuff!

http://crackle.com/c/Jace_Hall

(id software stuff happens about half way thru video...)

post.author: rebb
post.body:
Been watching this show since they got first linked for showing DNF Footage. It's pretty awesome.

There's even an episode with Jack Thompson in it, hilarious.

Fun fact, Jace Hall is the Founder of Monolith and is credited on quite a few High-Profile Games -> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jason_Hall_(producer) .

I'm hoping that they will feature John Romero and Tom Hall in the next Season.

post.author: pbmax
post.body: "This is Texas. People do this stuff all the time here."

post.author: Mordenkainen
post.body: Oh my, that Willits bit was awesome!

post.author: aardwolf
post.body: Wait, the host of the show is actually the monolith guy Jason Hall??

post.author: aardwolf
post.body:
pbmax wrote:
"This is Texas. People do this stuff all the time here."


No wonder george w bush was governor there. they should nuke themselves out of the planet.

post.author: john_doe2
post.body: That was actually pretty fun to watch. If only we could've seen at least a glimpse of a monitor running some Doom 4 stuff. Well, I guess they might actually show stuff soon.
